channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole, 2nd January
item.description:
Theres at least 1 pot hole and I believe its near the crossing point thats just before the entrance/exit for Laithwaites.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7100 Hurricane Road, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two Potholes, 2nd January
item.description:
Two potholes one a few inches deep and another a few meter further down the hill. On the left edge of the road if heading up the hill.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 31 Greenway Lane, Ullenwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poo bin needs emptying, 2nd January
item.description:
This is by Moorend Road and needs emptying, please. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Brook House Moorend Road, Charlton Park
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Discarded road signs, 2nd January
item.description:
There are three discarded road sign frames on the grass verge on the south side of the A40 between Whittington Road and Arle Court Roundabout. I have added photos of two - one is near the base of the permanent road sign and the other two are further west.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 58 Whittington Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chain-link fence down, causing a trip hazard on the pavement, 2nd January
item.description:
Can somebody take a look and decide what to do about it?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 90 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping M5 Southbound slip Jcn 11A, 1st January
item.description:
Several black sacks fly tipped on the slip road Area was cleared by volunteers last year and could do with a tidy up too.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Brockworth Roundabout, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Culvert, 1st January
item.description:
A support slab on the culvert between the railings has become detached and a small dog or child could slip into the brook below. It is situated on the green in Benhall Park as indicated on map
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 26 Bibury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous pothole, 1st January
item.description:
There is a deep and dangerous pothole which could damage a vehicle's wheel. It is situated on Robert Burn's Avenue, Benhall, Cheltenham just over the bridge on the right hand side next to a BT telecoms box

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars destroying council grass verge and turning it into mud, 1st January
item.description:
The residents of Old Gloucester Road are seemingly not willing to park on-road at the back on Kingfisher Drive and instead are parking on the grass verge on the main road. The grass has now turned to slush/mud and has sustained damage. It is also a safety issue if a child/pet runs out from parked cars into a 40Mph main road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Old Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole on Old Bath Road, 1st January
item.description:
Pot hole on the carriageway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Verney Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Near junctions of bryerland and pillcroft rd, 1st January
item.description:
Pot hole appeared after severn trent repaired water leak in a tenants garden. So bad tears are actually banging driving into it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 13 Bryerland Road, Witcombe

item.title: Couple of deep pothole opening up outside lakeside school, 31st December
